profile:
6 Times Winner - THE BEST MATTRESS STORE IN TORONTO - BEST OF HOMESTARS AWARD WINNER - THANK YOU! :)

WE HAVE THE LOWEST PRICE ON TOP QUALITY MATTRESSES AND THE BEST SERVICE



Its simple, we sell Top Quality Mattresses for Less, directly from the Factory. 
WE ARE THE MATTRESS SPECIALISTS! Professional - No pushy service, no upselling, friendly service, best 
industry knowledge.

Best Quality. Best Service. Best Price. Buy a top quality mattress from the mattress specialists! 

As we are an online store, we offer lower price thanks to no retail fees or fancy showrooms (overhead costs). You save 40-60% compare to any retail sale! 
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
You can always come and see mattresses before buying in our warehouse (please contact us for appointment).
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
We provide FREE DELIVERY IN GTA! Same day delivery or delivery out of GTA available as well. Anytime you wish, we will deliver it directly to your room and will help you with set up.

>>>>> Local pick up is also available! <<<<<

We sell all types of mattresses: euro top, tight top, orthopedic, all natural, hypo-allergenic, talalay latex, memory foam, BIO soy bean foam, coil free, pocket coil, baby crib mattresses, custom sized mattresses and more. All TOP QUALITY and Made in Canada. 

All mattresses are under the FULL manufacturer warranty. 


TonFurniture.com 
Euro-Canadian Mattress Specialists
647.839.5672
service_area:
Toronto area online mattress store - Factory direct sale. Best place to get quality mattresses for less!
Free delivery within the GTA!

We serve the whole GTA:
Toronto, Burlington, Oakville, Mississauga, Thornhill,Scarborough,Pickering,Ajax, Whitby, Oshawa, Markham, Richmond Hill, Vaughan,Woodbridge, Aurora, Newmarket, Maple, Orangeville, Brampton, Georgetown, Milton.

from Brulington on west to Oshawa on east and north to Newmarket.
